YouTubers show building on nether roof and I feel it is not fair for bedrock players. Can you please fix this for bedrock users to build as well on the nether roof. Also allow bedrock to use beds and doors underwater like in Java. Thank you.
Nintendo never gets anything!!! plz put vibrant visuals on Nintendo switch
Put it on the Switch! (even if it runs at 5 FPS)

I am hoping/expecting that vibrant visuals will at least be available on the Switch 2, (it would be great if it worked well on the original switch too - but I will take what I can get.) My main concern is if we own Minecraft bedrock for the original switch already, will we have to pay to upgrade it in order to use Vibrant Visuals on the Switch 2? If we have to pay how much? 

The sooner the information about this is officially released the better i.e. less time for negative speculation.

Vibrant Visual isn't on Switch because it's in beta and only available in Minecraft Preview. Nintendo doesn't provide any way for developers to release betas outside of the current version of the game, so there's the explanation for why it's not on Switch (no, they're not discriminating against anyone).
Just add it on Switch, who cares if it doesn't load, just try!!!

Mojang Studios is currently testing and planning on bringing Vibrant Visuals to Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 and possibly in the near future, Mojang Studios might release it on the Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 (either partially or fully). And the developers said in the Minecraft LIVE event, "We're working on bringing Vibrant Visuals to more Bedrock devices in the near future." So, it might or might not come out on Nintendo Switch (possibly Nintendo Switch 2). I hope this info helped out

-RIADBELU

I got a problem with this beta update (1.17.40.20)!

I hope you can solve the problem as soon as posible.
